## Properties

| Property                 | Attribute      | Description                           | Type      | Default     |
| ------------------------ | -------------- | ------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `enlargeLink`            | `enlarge-link` | optional extended link                | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `horizontal`             | `horizontal`   | optional horizontal position          | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `href` _(required)_      | `href`         | mandatory hypertext link              | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `titleType` _(required)_ | `title-type`   | mandatory title level (h1, h2 ... h6) | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `titre`                  | `titre`        | mandatory title                       | `string`  | `undefined` |
